testcase.brief: Check dhcp packet process for laptop1/laptop2 with lan ports port based mode
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: PC1 connect to switch Laptop1 connect to lan port eth1 Laptop2 connect to lan port eth4 Station1 connect to wifi BR lan port works with port based/trunk mode
Test Procedure: 1. Configure mgt0.1 vlan 20 2. Configure user-profile vlan 20 attribute 20 User-profile test20 vlan 20 attribute 20 3. Configure lan port eth1/eth4 user-profile-attribute 20 Interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 20 Interface eth4 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 20
4. Laptop1 connect to eth1, retrieve ip address from mgt0.1dhcp server. Result1
5. Laptop2 connect to eth4, retrieve ip address from mgt0.1 dhcp server. Result2

step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable"

step.desc: 2. Configure user-profile vlan 20 attribute 20 User-profile test20 vlan 20 attribute 20 3. Configure lan port eth1/eth4 user-profile-attribute 20 Interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 20 Interface eth3 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 20
step.telnet: -v "user-profile lan1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface eth3 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute ${br1.vpc1.vlan}"

step.desc: Laptop1 connect to lan port eth1
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
Result1: laptop1 get ip address successfully assigned by mgt0.1 dhcp server
step.script: if [ "${br1.vpc1.prefix}" == "${br1.mgt0.1.prefix}" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

step.desc: 4. Laptop2 connect to eth3, retrieve ip address from mgt0.1 dhcp server. Result2
step.console: -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "" -v "" -v "interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "" -v ""

step.desc: get IP address of ap1 mgt0
Result2: laptop1 get ip address successfully assigned by mgt0.1 dhcp server
step.script: if [ "${br1.ap1.prefix}" == "${br1.mgt0.1.prefix}" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
